mapper.select: select edu_website_images.image_id, edu_website_images.image_url, edu_website_images.link_address, edu_website_images.title, edu_website_images.type_id, edu_website_images.series_number, edu_website_images.preview_url, edu_website_images.color, edu_website_images.describe , edu_website_images_type.type_name from edu_website_images left join edu_website_images_type on edu_website_images_type.type_id =edu_website_images.type_id order by edu_website_images_type.type_id,edu_website_images.series_number
select type_id as typeid,type_name as typename from edu_website_images_type
